review: Didn't work well with single bandwidth wifi. Upgraded my router to dual bandwidth wifi and it's working much better.
author: Derek Cross

review: If you're a charter spectrum customer, you can't access any of your cable apps through Amazon Stick. I guess they don't have an agreement with a Charter.
author: Stephanie Ehrhart

review: Works as advertised, but am disappointed that I can not get Prime content in South America where I live most of the time.
author: Ronaldo

review: Setup was easy and it couldn't be easier to use.
author: Deborah

review: Awesome!!!!! We love our fire sticks. We have two in our house now and love them. They are very easy to use and offer lots of options.
author: Jlowe16655 "jlowe"

review: Out of the box ,it smooth running,  but then , it started filling up the cache and became really slow,  this is within about 2.5 weeks of use.
author: john rocha

review: I love my Fire TV Stick. Easy to install and set up. Gives watching TV a whole new meaning. I highly recommend this product!!
author: Dawn Daniel
